settings.description: Get and set bot configuration settings like prefix using subcommands `info` and `set`.

embed.title: Bot Settings
embed.description:
Below are my settings for the server **{guild.name}** ({guild.id}).
Run `{prefix}settings info [setting]` to get more information about a setting.
Run `{prefix}settings set [setting] [new_setting]` to change a setting.

settings.guide:
To change a setting's value, run `{prefix}settings set [setting] [new_value]`
To get information about a setting, run `{prefix}settings info [setting]`.
To reset the value of a setting, run `{prefix}settings reset [setting]`.

errors.BadArgument: Setting "{setting_name}" is not an existing or defined setting.

errors.InvalidArgument: "{value}" is not a valid value. To learn about valid values for {setting_name}, run `{prefix}settings info {setting_name}`.

prefix.name: Prefix
prefix.description: The command prefix is what the message content must start with to have a command invoked. It cannot be an empty text.

fields.name: Settings Type
fields.value: Text - Has to be 1 to 10 characters long.

fields.name: Update This Setting
fields.value: Change prefix by using: `{prefix}settings set prefix [value]`.

security.name: Bot Security Level
security.description: The type of permission required to access certain commands of this bot.

fields.name: Settings Type
fields.value:
Text - Has to be one of the following:
 - `none` (anyone can access all bot commands, not reccomended)
 -  `server_manager` (only members with the server manager permission can use)
 -  `admin` (only server administrators)
 -  `owner` (only server owner can use).

fields.name: Update This Setting
fields.value: Change security level by using: `{prefix}settings set security [value]`.

automath.name: AutoMath
automath.description: Whether or not the bot will automatically detect and answer simple math expressions (similar to `{prefix}calculate`).

fields.name: Settings Type
fields.value:
Text - Has to be one of the following:
 - `Yes` (automatically respond) 
 -  `No` (Do not automatically respond).

fields.name: Update This Setting
fields.value: Change whether AutoMath is enabled by using: `{prefix}settings set automath [value]`.

archivecategory.name: Archive Category
archivecategory.description: The category in which archived channels are stored in. Archived channels will have their permissions synced with the category, so for archiving, the permissions ideally will restrict members from seeing the category. The bot will create a category the first time a channel is archived.

fields.name: Category Name
fields.value: Text - The full name of the category

fields.name: Update This Setting
fields.value: Change the archive category by using: `{prefix}settings set archivecategory [value]`.
